column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Best pizza in Chicago. I have lived here my whole life and I always read sites listing top 10 pizza
column2: etc - this one is my favorite. The butter crust is a must and make sure it's uncut and extra sauce. Then again this is like asking someone their favorite movie. Super personal and ratios of bread
column3: cheese and sauce are different for everyone - Add it to the mix and judge for yourself.
